3: That's the last two!
Urgh—
Ah...! What?
What's the situation, Lucia?
My arm, it's not responding.
Urgh—!
Move!
Urgh!
...Let me take a look.
...Looks like it's completely broken.
I only did some temporary repairs earlier so of course, it's going to break if you use it like that...
Though I'm the one to talk.
... (Looks at his gun's smoking barrel)
Commandant, survivor found!
You finally... came...
You've already been corrupted by the Punishing Virus, but fortunately, it still hasn't exceeded the tolerance limit of your Inver-Device.
Please allow me to access your M.I.N.D., I can help lessen your burden from fighting with the virus.
Thank you... I never thought I'd live to see such an advanced Support-type Construct...
If only they were able to hold on a bit longer...

2: Did you see a white-haired Construct?

3: Sorry, but we haven't encountered the Construct you asked about...
We're a supply team that got forced to retreat onto this bridge by the Corrupted and made this temporary communication station as a last resort.
The amount of Corrupted and threat levels here exceeded our calculations... They broke through our guard rather quickly...
We've never seen anything like that before... I can say for sure that the Corrupted have formed an organization...
The Corrupted should only be able to follow the kill order of the Punishing Virus...
Please elaborate on what you mean by having formed an organization.
Did you notice those graffiti nearby?
We found that these graffiti will draw in the mechanoid Corrupted, and only they can understand its true meaning.
We tried to decipher the messages, but mechanoids with human consciousness like us can't understand it at all...
Be careful of those graffiti... They are gathering the Corrupted...
Is this a new behavior of the Corrupted due to the control of the Punishing Virus?
I'm afraid not, the Corrupted's only goal is to destroy humans and everything that has human consciousness.
But they don't need to communicate with each other, or maybe this is a result of something else other than the Punishing Virus.
Thank you for your information and contribution.
Please recall now. We will notify the Purifying Force to retrieve your frames.
Oh, one more thing...
